title: Kindred's Ultimate
body:
Quick random thought,

but...

Kindred's ult should damage enemy champions for the same amount that it heals allied champions upon it's completion.

This would make it a "I shouldn't prolong a fight in this zone, zone (If you're the enemy).

Figure if you're both low, you'll get a small heal while the end of the ultimate would finish (or almost finish) off enemies still caught in the zone.

I feel this would feel more interactive than it's current state.

Just an idea.
